mapper.select: with recursive cte as ( select ARRAY[sort_no] AS hierarchy , template_category_id , name , upper_category_id , sort_no , 1 as level from template_category where upper_category_id is null union all select c.hierarchy || c.sort_no , e.template_category_id , e.name , e.upper_category_id , e.sort_no , c.level + 1 from cte c join template_category e on e.upper_category_id = c.template_category_id ) select * from cte order by hierarchy
